caption.title: Final size versus travel ratio.
caption.p: Final size versus ratio of non-commuting travel to commuting for various clustering levels, Îº, with corresponding 95% confidence bands. a) All locations. b) Locations with population size smaller than the 25% quantile. c) Locations with population size between the 25% and 50% quantile. d) Locations with population size between the 50% quantile and the 75% quantile. e) Locations with population size larger than the 75% quantile.
